workouts.title: Full Body Workout
workouts.description: This workout includes strength training and cardio exercises targeting all major muscle groups.

details.warmup: 5 minutes of light cardio (jogging, jumping jacks)
details.exercises: Squats, Push-ups, Lunges (3 sets of 12 reps each)
details.cardio: 15 minutes of interval training (sprint for 30 seconds, walk for 1 minute)

workouts.benefits: Improves overall fitness, builds strength, and increases endurance.

workouts.title: Upper Body Strength
workouts.description: Focus on building strength in the chest, back, shoulders, and arms with this targeted routine.

details.exercises: Bench Press, Bent-over Rows, Shoulder Press (3 sets of 10 reps each)

workouts.benefits: Increases upper body strength and muscle definition.

workouts.title: Core Conditioning
workouts.description: This program focuses on strengthening your core muscles for improved stability and posture.

details.exercises: Planks, Russian Twists, Bicycle Crunches (3 sets of 15 reps), Leg Raises, V-Ups
details.stability: Bird-Dogs, Dead Bugs (3 sets of 10 reps each)

workouts.benefits: Enhances core strength, stability, and overall body control.

workouts.title: Leg Day
workouts.description: A comprehensive leg workout targeting quads, hamstrings, glutes, and calves.

details.warmup: 5 minutes of light cardio (jumping jacks or jogging)
details.exercises: Squats, Deadlifts, Lunges (4 sets of 10 reps each)

workouts.benefits: Builds lower body strength and tones muscles.
